alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 1:20PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Prowers and Kiowa Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 118 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing across portions of Kiowa County, that may spread into northern Prowers County later this hour. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eads, Sheridan Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, Towner, Sweetwater Reservoir, Chivington, Brandon, Neegronda Reservoir and Queens Reservoir. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County
